thread.title: Jon Jakubowski
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Jon Jakubowski

author: Jon Jakubowski
title: Jon Jakubowski
text: My wife and I made a purchase during the VIP sales event and the sales people greet you as they should. But one of the things we enjoyed vs other furniture places we were not pressured. If we had questions we were serviced and this made our experience much more comfortable to do business. They really try to make the experience smooth and reassuring they will take care of getting your purchase to you in a timely manner. The delivery guys were good to, they have a lot to get done in a day so they don't mess around. I highly recommend you look over your delivery as they unload, makes things easier for everyone if you notice something. My experience was pretty smooth and effortless.
